exploit.name: Atonix
description: Atonix was a executor started by now ex-WeAreDevs member Soulzay/bennytrt. In may of 2022 after watching a 1_f0 tutorial. A while later WeAreDevs Members Whoman & eforcarl joined the team and made the logo, script hub, and a remake of the UI in WPF with more APIs.

A newcomer to the scene by the name of Stredja Banan Joined and remade the UI in Winforms, styled after the then very popular Synapse X. A controversial decision was made, Nam3 joined the team and remade the whole of atonix up until v2.

At some point JoeIsGod, a WeAreDevs member joined the team to make a Module (which didn't happen) and the project died, but was revived by Soulzay and also controversial member MTyler1. After a month, the project died once more and was discontinued somewhere in 2024.
warnings: This exploit is discontinued! anyone advertising a new Atonix version is scamming or ratting!
